title: Urban Meyer Fired after 13 games; Chargers vs. Chiefs; DeAndre Hopkins OUT; Best QB matchups; Nate Burleson
itunes:title: Urban Meyer Fired after 13 games; Chargers vs. Chiefs; DeAndre Hopkins OUT; Best QB matchups; Nate Burleson
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Rachel Bonnetta, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion, Shaun O'Hara, open up the show reacting to the overnight breaking news that Urban Meyer is out in Jacksonville after only 13 games. Then they preview the intense Thursday Night Football matchup between division opponents, the Los Angeles Chargers and Kansas City Chiefs; they examine how the Arizona Cardinals can fight through the DeAndre Hopkins injury which will have him out for the rest of the regular season; they share which quarterback matchup they're most looking forward to watching this weekend; they're joined by Zach Orth and Tim Jarocky, who were responsible for getting the balls from Tom Brady's 600th and 700th touchdown passes and lastly, they're joined by Nate Burleson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
